item.title: Parked outside my property for 3 days, 18th December
item.description:
Parked between 100 and 102 Glenbow Road. Doesn't belong to me or my neighbour.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenbow Road, Downham, Greater London

item.title: Pathway and Road Flooding, 18th December
item.description:
Puddles on pathway and puddles in road, in front of mobile phone kiosk, pedestrians and kiosk customer get soaked when transport passes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Elephant and Castle, Greater London

item.title: Dumped toilet, 18th December
item.description:
Could you please remove a dumped toilet and cardboard boxes form the middle of the pavement? Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leaside Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Streetlight CW104 is not working, 18th December
item.description:
CW104 is on the narrow path with a deep slope into a dell on one side. It is completely dark and unsafe, especially as the sides of the footpath have deep ruts of mud caused by Peabody vehicles driving through the area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Ridgeway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights out along Crossway, 18th December
item.description:
At least 6 street lights are out from Poplar Place to Glendale Road. Both sides of the road resulting in total darkness for pedestrians and vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged brick paving a severe trip hazard, 18th December
item.description:
The brick paved sidewalk running alongside the bridge over the A2 has two bricks misplaced with one set very proud right in the middle of the walkway, creating a dangerous trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Well Hall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Bus Station - Damage to road or pavement within the Bus Station

item.title: Deep pot holes collecting water on pavement, 18th December
item.description:
Deep pot holes and sunken pavement, the public path along the rail track. Water collects making it impossible to pass for the disabled and pushchair users as the only option to avoid it is by climbing the slippery sloped verge full of mud. Been like this for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longfield Crescent, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains are clogged, 18th December
item.description:
Rainwater collecting in huge puddles opposite Dr's surgery in Granville Road outside Brenda Court and Emmanuel Church
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Granville Road, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car with hidden registration number, 18th December
item.description:
Deliberate paint over the reg plate. Looks suspicious. Untaxed ? Car has not been moved for over a week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royston Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging vegetation near Kentish Road X bus stop, 18th December
item.description:
Overhanging vegetation alongside the pavement by Kentish Road X bus stop. Has been like that for years, meaning we have to walk in the road after getting off bus to walk down Picardy Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shrubbery obstructing pavement, 18th December
item.description:
Shrubbery growth obstructing pavement for years. Difficult to define whether in garden of 61 Abbey Road end of fencing as you walk down Ripley Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ripley Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
